system.description:
When you leap up and then slam the ground, shattering it, spend 1 Beat to bring all tiles in burst 1 down by -2 Elevation. (A +3 Elevation becomes +1). This attack ignores elevation: even if an adjacent tile is on +6 elevation and you're on +2 elevation, that tile is still brought down to +4 elevation.

Leaping Makara: Spend 2 Beats to also Fly 2 before bringing the tiles down.

Open The Caves of Sulad: Spend 3 Beats to also increase the affected area to burst 2.
system.flavor:
1. The Buwaya brings with it hell.

  2. And with a bellow, it brings others with it.

- Makara Exalt Sutla 128

Crocodiles are venerated like ancestor gods in the isles, and to have one fight with you is a sign of respect and prestige. They are sometimes seen as psychopomps, and that is exactly what you will be doing: bringing your enemies to hell.
